description: Haunted and torn, Nikola quietly destroys the sealed archive, then hands sanitized fragments to Directorate officials. No evidence of purges surfaces.
With official silence and no new proof, activist groups escalate by declaring 'scoreless' districts, abandoning Council systems and igniting parallel public movements.
The 'scoreless' announce self-governance in key districts, organizing alternative markets and clinics. Large numbers of residents opt in, turning away from official BCI-tied systems.
Directorate attempts to block local services to scoreless areas. Technical glitches and public defiance thwart crackdowns, with some loyalist workers joining the collective.
Oksana and Rada publicly support the scoreless, drawing more citizens away from the BCI. Minor government offices stand empty as mass resignations spread.
